oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Study of upper critical field in superconducting borocarbides RNi(2)B(2)C (R=Y,Ho,Er,Tm)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAZUMDAR, C
HOSSAIN, Z
RADHA, S
NIGAM, AK
NAGARAJAN, R
GUPTA, LC
GODART, C
PADALIA, BD
CHANDRA, G
VIJAYARAGHAVAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: honi2b2c
system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have determined upper critical field, H-c2(T), from resistivity measurements in the borocarbide superconductors, RNi(2)B(2)C (R=Y, Ho, Er, Tm). The H-c2(T) of these materials show a positive curvature which is unlike of a conventional type-II superconductor. Features corresponding to coexistence of superconductivity and magnetism are observed in HoNi2B2C and ErNi2B2C. From the resistivity measurements, we observe a double reentrant behaviour in our sample of HoNi2B2C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Strongly Correlated Electron Systems (SCES 95),GOA, INDIA,SEP 27-30, 1995
